text: Tribune Publishing Company (formerly Tronc, Inc.) is an American newspaper print and online media publishing company based in Chicago, Illinois. The company's portfolio includes the Chicago Tribune, the New York Daily News, The Baltimore Sun, the Orlando Sentinel, South Florida's Sun-Sentinel, the Hartford Courant, more newspapers in Pennsylvania and Virginia, and websites. ==References== Category:Publishing companies of the United States Category:Companies based in Chicago Category:2014 establishments in the United States
title: Tribune Publishing
